verses.verse: Now the <S%H4256>divisions<s%> of the <S%H1121>descendants<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> [were these: ] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> [were] <S%H5070>Nadab,<s%> <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>

But <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their father and <S%H1>had<s%> <S%H1961>no<s%> <S%H3808>sons.<s%> So <S%H1121>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H499>Ithamar<s%> <S%H385>served<s%> as <S%H3547>priests.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David,<s%> with <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> <S%H2505>divided<s%> them according to their <S%H6486>offices<s%> for their <S%H5656>ministry.<s%>

Since <S%H7227>more<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H1397>men<s%> were <S%H4672>found<s%> from the <S%H1121>descendants<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H1121>descendants<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> they <S%H2505>divided<s%> them thus: [there were] <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of fathers' <S%H1004>households<s%> of the <S%H1121>descendants<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> of the <S%H1121>descendants<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> according to their fathers' <S%H1004>households.<s%>

Thus they were <S%H2505>divided<s%> by <S%H1486>lot,<s%> the <S%H428>one<s%> as the <S%H428>other;<s%> for they were <S%H8269>officers<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and <S%H8269>officers<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> both from the <S%H1121>descendants<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and the <S%H1121>descendants<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>

And <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5417>Nethanel<s%> the <S%H9373>scribe,<s%> from the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H3789>recorded<s%> them in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H4428>king,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H54>Abiathar,<s%> and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households] of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and of the <S%H3881>Levites;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> father's <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H270>taken<s%> for <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and one <S%H270>taken<s%> for <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>
Now the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out for <S%H3080>Jehoiarib,<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> for <S%H3048>Jedaiah,<s%>
the twenty-first for <S%H3199>Jachin,<s%> the twenty-second for <S%H1577>Gamul,<s%>
the twenty-third for <S%H1806>Delaiah,<s%> the twenty-fourth for <S%H4590>Maaziah.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> were their <S%H6486>offices<s%> for their <S%H5656>ministry,<s%> when [they] <S%H935>came<s%> in to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> [given] to them <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> their father, <S%H1>just<s%> as the <S%H9201>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> of <S%H430>Israel<s%> had <S%H3478>commanded<s%> him.

Now for the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi:<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram,<s%> <S%H7619>Shubael;<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7619>Shubael,<s%> <S%H3165>Jehdeiah.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> [of Hebron: ] <S%H3404>Jeriah<s%> [the first,] <S%H568>Amariah<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H3166>Jahaziel<s%> the <S%H7992>third,<s%> <S%H3360>Jekameam<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4187>Mushi:<s%> <S%H4249>Mahli,<s%> <S%H5740>Eder,<s%> and <S%H3406>Jerimoth.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> [were] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to their fathers' <S%H1004>households.<s%>

<S%H1992>These<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> <S%H5980>just<s%> as their <S%H251>relatives<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> <S%H288>Ahimelech,<s%> and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households] of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> â€“ the <S%H7218>head<s%> of fathers' [households] as <S%H5980>well<s%> as those of his <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother.<s%>
